title: AngelChest
description: When you die, your items are added into a chest at your death location. You will be given a map to locate your death location. You can also do /actp to tp there!

title: ChestShop
description: Sell anything for any price with Chest Shops! You can sell at your own custom warp with /iwarp create or /setwarp!

title: Rideable Mobs
description: You can ride any of the select mobs, including flying glow squids, fishes, bees, and dogs/cats! Whichever one you prefer.

title: Teleportable Mobs
description: You can teleport any rideable mob with you while riding it! Useful if you want to transport villagers in boats.

title: Discord Server
description: Please join the Discord server for important updates and to chat with the community!

title: Sit Anywhere
description: Sit, lay or crawl anywhere with /sit, /crawl, and /lay. You can also right click stairs with a free hand to sit!

title: Claims
description: Claim your base to avoid grief! How? Just take a golden shovel and mark the corners! You can also play around with various claim flags with /gpflags

title: Jobs
description: Do various jobs to earn money with /jobs and get money from doing different actions in the server!

title: Marriage
description: Love someone so much that you want to marry them in the server? Marry them with /marry [name]!

title: DrSleep
description: Easily skip the night with the need of only 1 player to sleep! Want to keep the night? do /preventsleep!

title: AuraSkills
description: Earn experience in different aspects of Minecraft and get special abilities!

title: Slimefun
description: A plugin that adds a ton of new content to the game, including new crafting recipes, machines, and more!

title: Custom World Generation
description: Tired of vanilla? The world is custom generated with beautiful unique biomes, structures, and terrain features!

title: EvenMoreFish
description: More varieties of fish which you can catch and sell for money!

title: Custom Music Discs
description: Add your own music discs to the game with custom songs! Do /disc search <name> to find your song while holding a music disc! The PlasmoVoice mod needs to be installed.

title: Voting Perks and Ranks
description: Vote for the server to earn rewards and climb the ranks!
